keyMappings:
# vimium-c cannot be inputed properly by korean.
# vimium is more stable when it accept korean word in search mode 
# vimium has some bug that doesn't work all keybindings until it reset.



########### scroll / navigate ##############
# ]], [[ for next/previous page in lists doesn't work
unmap <c-y>
unmap <c-e>
map k scrollDown
map j scrollUp

# m : mark current scroll location
map ' Marks.activateGotoMode
map = visitPreviousTab

# open link in new tab and switch it
unmap F
map F LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewForegroundTab

# open multiple link in new tab
map <a-f> LinkHints.activateModeWithQueue

# p : open clipboards url in current tab
# P : open clipboard url in new tab
# r : reload
# t : create new tab
# T : select tab (include other web instance)
# / : search (n, N)
# H : previous page
# L : forward page

############ managing #########
unmap x
unmap X
map q removeTab
map Q restoreTab
map ww closeOtherTabs
map wq closeTabsOnLeft
map we closeTabsOnRight
map t duplicateTab

# W : move tab to new window



############# zoom ############
map zz setZoom level=2.0
map zi zoomIn
map zo zoomOut
map z0 zoomReset

############ focus ##########
# gi : focus visible text box with colorful
# F2 doesn't be supported like vimium-c
map F2 focusInput

########### yank #########
# v : visual mode, start with / to set initial cursor
# c (in visual) : carot mode, to move cursor, 
#                 after then, retry 'v' to insert in visual mode
# yy : copy current url
# yf : copy selected url using f
# yi : copy image only (vimium only)
# p : open url from clipboard in current tab
# P : open url from clipbaord in new tab

######### vomnibar #########
# open history in new tab
# o : insert mode in url. open it / it can search anything
#     it contains history / bookmark / search any
# O : o in new tab
# b : search in bookmark in currenttab
# B : open bookmark in new tab
# ge : edit current url
# gE : edit current url and open new tab

######### unmap #########
unmap gn
unmap <a-n>
unmap <a-s-c>
unmap <a-c>
unmap <a-v>
unmap <a-p>
unmap gf
searchEngines:
g: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google
y: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube
w|wiki: https://www.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?search=%s Wikipedia
gs: https://scholar.google.com/scholar?q=$s Google_Scholar
gh: https://github.com/search?q=$s Github
n: https://search.naver.com/search.naver?query=%s Naver
nd: https://dict.naver.com/dict.search?dicQuery=%s&query=%s Naver_Dicts
nm: https://namu.wiki/Go?q=%s Namuwiki
